title: Did A Child See A Spirit? | Horror Podcast
description:
Today on another bone chilling episode of Real Ghost Stories Online. 

A young child’s stomach is tied in knots every time they are sent off to visit their grandparents in the deep south. 

Anxiety and fear caused not because of the living, but because of the dead that seem to infest the family farm that has been standing for more than a century, where night after night, new visitors would be tormented with the actions of the unwelcoming spirits. 

Could this home’s haunting be caused by the thousands of unmarked graves laying nearby? 

And, with that much negativity and death, could this home ever truly be a peaceful place for the living to find rest?

That story, and many more, today, on Real Ghost Stories Online.



Watch more at: http://www.realghoststoriesonline.com/

If you have a real ghost story or supernatural event to report, please write into our podcast about the paranormal or call 1-855-853-4802!
If you like the show and love spooky things, please help keep us on the air and support the show by becoming an EPP (Extra Podcast Person). We'll give you a BONUS episode every week as a "Thank You" for your support. Become an EPP here: http://www.ghostpodcast.com/?page_id=118 or at or at http://www.patreon.com/realghoststories
